title: LOWER PRIORITY QUEUE
body:
NEED TO REMOVE THAT I IN THIS LOWER PRIORITY... BECAUSE I LEFT MATCH. THE OFTEN CRASH AND THEY TOLD THAT I'M LOWER...
NEED TO REMOVE PLEASE

replies.body: The caps really help sell your point.

First off, nobody is going to take you seriously if you type in all caps.

Second off, no it will not be removed because you left your match and disadvantaged your team. I suggest figuring out what causes your crashes before playing more.
